## Bcp47.LanguageTag.toPreferred() method

Gets a confirmed preferred representation of this language tag.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toPreferred(): Result<LanguageTag>;
```
**Returns:**

Result&lt;[LanguageTag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a preferred representation of this [language tag](./ts-bcp47.bcp47.languagetag.md)<!-- -->, or `Failure` with details if the tag cannot be normalized to preferred form.
